secret.doc: String, buffer, or object containing either the secret for HMAC algorithms or the PEM encoded private key for RSA and ECDSA.

expiresIn.doc: expressed in seconds or a string describing a time span [zeit/ms](https://github.com/zeit/ms). Eg: `60`, `"2 days"`, `"10h"`, `"7d"`. A numeric value is interpreted as a seconds count. If you use a string be sure you provide the time units (days, hours, etc), otherwise milliseconds unit is used by default (`"120"` is equal to `"120ms"`).

basePath.doc: The base URL path for application.

explorer.doc: Determines if Swagger (Open API) is enabled.

explorerPath.doc: The URL path for Swagger (Open API) specification.
